original_text: Having therefore obtained help of God, I continue unto this day, witnessing both to small and great, saying none other things than those which the prophets and Moses did say should come:
korean_text: 하나님의 도우심을 받아 내가 오늘까지 서서 높고 낮은 사람 앞에서 증언하는 것은 선지자들과 모세가 반드시 되리라고 말한 것밖에 없으니

sentences.original_text: Having therefore obtained help of God,
witnessing both to small and great,
sentences.korean_translation: 작은 자와 큰 자 모두에게 증거하며,

sentences.original_text: than those which the prophets and Moses did say
